title: Searge: 关于命令方块的更新的更多信息
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-8-18 12:33 编辑 


Searge: It's not about multi-commands, auto-complete or the gui. But I'll revolutionize how command blocks are used. More spoilers tomorrow.
Searge: 它不是关于多指令、自动补全或是GUI。但是我对命令方块的用法进行了革新。明天会有更多剧透。


Searge: And I mentioned the "beating in the face" because most people would want to change the way they use them. We will see some tears of joy.
Searge: 我提到了“扇我巴掌”是因为大多数人想要改变命令方块的使用方法。他们会高兴地流泪。


Searge: We'll have only few changes for commands in 1.9, the main focus is survival features, so these few changes should at least be great.
Searge: 我们在1.9的更新中对指令不会改变太大，因为主要的工作是生存的特性，所以这些改变必须要好。


Searge: For once I'm sorry for being a bit cryptic, but I'll get better feedback if I don't spoil the fun before people can try my changes.
Searge: 我对我的神秘而抱歉，但是如果我不剧透的话当人们尝试这些改变时我能得到更好反馈。


Searge: There are some concerns about this, so I'll tell you now that existing command block contraptions (for the 1.9 snapshots) will keep working.
Searge: 如果你为此而担心，那么我告诉你现有的命令方块会保持工作。


Searge: This is the last thing I'll show about it today, already spammed enough for one evening :) 
Searge: 这是我今天剧透的最后一件事，垃圾信息已经足够我处理一晚上了 :)

解读：
注意，最后一条下面的命令方块材质和现在不一样！
